name: keep_kill_01

name: keep_kill_03

name: keep_kill_05
text: Your quest and mine were at cross purposes.

name: keep_kill_06

name: keep_kill_07

name: keep_rival_01
text: Out of Chaos, order is imposed.

name: keep_rival_05
text: You'll not threaten the light, Chaos Knight.
text_simple: youll not threaten the light chaos knight

name: keep_rival_06

name: keep_rival_08
text: Night Stalker, I bring you into the light.
text_simple: night stalker i bring you into the light

name: keep_rival_09
text: You were as old as the first day, but I am as old as the first light.
text_simple: you were as old as the first day but i am as old as the first light

text: Here's light in your eye. Eh heh heh heh.

text_simple: light is wasted on the eyeless one

name: keep_rival_13

name: keep_ally_01
text: I'll expect you to be on your best behavior, Chaos Knight.

text: My Lady of Pain, I adore you.

text: Youth before age, my dear. Please, you go first.
